content: an excellent scarf or dishcloth pattern dishcloths that comes out square and lay flat - scarves that look great or male or female - an excellent pattern for making gift-giving scarves both sides are beautiful so this makes a great reversible pattern the stitch pattern is a multiple of 3 +1 - so cast on any amount you want and get the same great look looks great in solids ombres and stripes available in english & german german translation provided by lealu http //lealu blogspot com/ thanks lealu
